original_title: Carl G. Jung by Jerome Hill or Lapis Philosophorum
overview: In 1950 Jerome Hill went to Zurich with the intention of making a film about Dr. Carl G. Jung. The project was abandoned when Hill decided that Jung was not a good subject. After Hill's death, Jonas Mekas edited the film which focuses on Dr. Jung as a person.
title: Carl G. Jung by Jerome Hill or Lapis Philosophorum
